name: Slack
description: Team communication — post alerts, incident updates, and security notifications to channels

tools: post_message — Post a message to a channel
reply_thread — Reply to an existing thread
upload_file — Upload a file/report to a channel

setup_steps: 1. Create a Slack App at api.slack.com/apps
2. Add Bot Token Scopes: chat:write, channels:read, files:write
security_notes: Bot should only have access to security-relevant channels
Use channel-specific posting — never post to #general
Message content may contain sensitive findings — restrict channel membership
AI-generated messages should be clearly labelled as AI-generated
Implement message approval for high-severity posts before sending
